column4: i want to take those images and put it together to create a new diagram
but dia does not allow import images
anyone know of a good calendar app that I can use with my work imap/exchange server ... or some app to fetch the calendar? i am keep missing my schedule meetings
it's buggy but it's good enough, will probably get better, and it's all I have right now :-)
so when u have a schedule meeting in calendar does it pop up in time?
I just find it slow too, so it takes patience, but it does the job
the pop-up doesn't work for me ATM, so I use kalarm each day to set pop-up alarms
for email i am using mutt to read the exchange imap files.. just the calendar functionality is missing
I just wanted something that could do Exchange on linux - evolution is one option that works
anyone else have a solution for exchange calendar? i will check out kalarm that Xenguy uses
I just assume that the evolution pop-ups will be fixed eventually
i am sure soon it will
